title.narrative: High value opportunity - Taiwan's Non Revenue Water Reduction 10-year Plan

description.narrative:
The state-owned utility Taiwan Water Company (TWC) is going to replace 6.000km water pipe and build 3.428 District Metering Areas, besides this make leakage detection. The HVO-fund will be used to increase the possibility of securing Danish Technologies in the Projects by inviting Taiwanese stakeholders to Denmark and conduct a study in Taiwan, to show the Danish solutions.
Taiwan currently suffers from the most severe draught over the past 67 years, and the situation is worsened by a NRW rate of close to 25%. The bigger project, the more water could be saved and thus resources can be allocated to further ground water detection and protection projects to provide more alternatives for drinking Water.
